## Slide 1 The [starterlog-theme](https://github.com/gadgetry-io/theme) includes [reveal.js](https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/) which enables you to create beautiful interactive slide decks in your Jekyll Posts using HTML and Markdown.
## Slide 2 The [starterlog-theme](https://github.com/gadgetry-io/theme) includes [reveal.js](https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/) which enables you to create beautiful interactive slide decks in your Jekyll Posts using HTML and Markdown.
## Slide 3 The [starterlog-theme](https://github.com/gadgetry-io/theme) includes [reveal.js](https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/) which enables you to create beautiful interactive slide decks in your Jekyll Posts using HTML and Markdown.
